titleStmt.title: A Map of the whole world, or, The Orb terrestrial in four parts, (viz.) Asia, Europe [double brace] Affrica [sic], America : containing all the known and most remarkable capes, ports, bayes, and isles, rocks, rivers, towns and cities ... and a new exact geography, especially their longitudes and latitudes, in alphabetical order, and fitted to all capacities ...

biblFull.extent: [8], 193 p., [5] folded leaves of plates : maps.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Jenner, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
